Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: MYSTERY OF THE HOPE DIAMOND
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Hope Diamond is the world's most valuable diamond, estimated to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. It is renowned for its nearly flawless clarity and rare deep-blue colour, but does it bear a curse?

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Vintage clothing store owner Doris Raymond is always on the lookout for the "Holy Grail"; the iconic piece that has been touched by one of the world's greatest designers. During a trip to an expo show in Dallas, she learns of such a garment, found discarded at the bottom of a closet

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The history of 20th-century America is on display at Doris Raymond's vintage clothing boutique, The Way We Wore(R). Decades of high fashion from iconic designers fill the racks of this boutique, each telling a story about society at the time.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey over New Brunswick's Bay of Fundy coastline explores geological wonders, the loyalist city of Saint John and international borders beyond and one of the world's most famous waterways.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: MYSTERY OF THE HOPE DIAMOND
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Hope Diamond is the world's most valuable diamond, estimated to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. It is renowned for its nearly flawless clarity and rare deep-blue colour, but does it bear a curse?

Clip.Title: U455 - THE MYSTERY OF THE LOST SUBMARINE
Clip.Episode: U455 - The Mystery of the Lost Submarine
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In summer 2008, a mysterious submarine was discovered off the coast of Italy at 120 meters deep. For Lorenzo del Veneziano, an underwater marine archeologist, it was an amazing sight, as the submarine was intact! Could this be the wreck of the long lost U-455, the last missing German U-boat from World War II?

Clip.Title: MENZIES AND CHURCHILL AT WAR
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow Robert Menzies to London during the dark months of 1941 as he takes on Winston Churchill, the British Prime Minister, over the strategic direction of the war, as the fate of Australia hangs in the balance

Clip.Title: OPERATION MINCEMEAT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Based on the best-selling book, Operation Mincemeat reveals the most successful deception of World War II that has been shrouded in secrecy for more than sixty years.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Monsoons in Vietnam have been a problem for centuries, but are compounded and strengthened by Climate Change.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The German Halligen islands, in the North Sea are threatened by the rise of the sea level, which could lead to their disappearance as Europe's first climatic refugees.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Bionic Vet and his staff must save a tiny chinchilla that has broken both of his arms and a Labrador puppy that needs a bionic appendage that exactly mirrors his diseased bone to save his life.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Off the eastern coast of Australia lies the Great Barrier Reef - a natural structure so large it stretches for over 1,200 miles and can be seen from outer space. This 6,000 year old underwater empire has been built from as many as 400 different species of coral, and holds some of the world's most iconic animals like clownfish, green sea turtles and barracudas.

Clip.Title: MARTIN CLUNES: A MAN AND HIS DOGS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Take a worldwide journey and we investigate where dogs come from, and why on earth they chose us as friends.

Clip.Title: MARTIN CLUNES: A MAN AND HIS DOGS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Out of over 4,000 mammals, how did dogs earn their spot by our side? Join us on our quest for answers.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Bionic Vet and his staff must save a tiny chinchilla that has broken both of his arms and a Labrador puppy that needs a bionic appendage that exactly mirrors his diseased bone to save his life.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Off the eastern coast of Australia lies the Great Barrier Reef - a natural structure so large it stretches for over 1,200 miles and can be seen from outer space. This 6,000 year old underwater empire has been built from as many as 400 different species of coral, and holds some of the world's most iconic animals like clownfish, green sea turtles and barracudas.
